thread.section_title: Capo d'Africa Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Absolutely recommend for all guests
thread.title_full: Absolutely recommend for all guests - Review of Capo d'Africa Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: ivsk2005
title: Absolutely recommend for all guests
text: There was good room, equipped with comfortable bed and all necessary furniture, included kettle (tea bags, coffee and etc.).There were terry and slippers . Reception, bar and restaurant personnel did great job. Room was cleaned several times per day.The hotel locates very close to the Colloseum, approx. 7 min. walking to the Colloseum and 10 min to the hop on/off bus and public transportation. Absolutely recommend to visit bar (bar keeper, Victoria is the diamond of the hotel) and taste Italian wines.
